CustomField.description: This field is utilised for Investigation type cases only. When the case is being created, Product Type will be auto-populated based on the consignment/article number tracking search result back from SAP and agent needs to manually select the values if it’s not available in SAP response.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is utilised for Investigation type cases only. When the case is being created, Product Type will be auto-populated based on the consignment/article number tracking search result back from SAP and agent needs to manually select the values if it’s not available in SAP response.
CustomField.label: Product Type
